Reviews.Title: “NIGHTMARE HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Joe C
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a NIGHTMARE!!! DO NOT STAY HERE!!!.. The room was disgusting dirty, The staff had an attitude when I arrived the room I had booked was not available. They said they were putting in the a better room. The cabinet was broken, carpet and bed appear as if they have not been cleaned..the towels where dirty along with the sheets, There were no safes in the room..no wifi connection that I could fine.. The room smelled and when I called expedia I was told we can try and get your money back. Expedia call the hotel and the person from the front desk call my room at 7:30 am in the morning with an attitude. This is the worse hotel I have ever stay at. no irons in the room. The clean the bathroom and made it look worse with stain.. I could not believe. DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL SAVE YOURSELF

Reviews.Title: “Good”
Reviews.Author: Ultimately
Reviews.Content: The only thing that lacks is closet. Excellent customer service. Great air conditioner. Very clean. If you are in a budget, this is the place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Worst night EVER”
Reviews.Author: jocro22
Reviews.Content: I understand this is only like 25 bucks a night, but I at least expected it to be decent. We reserved 3 nights and checked out by the 2nd night. I rated it a 1 but it is definately a ZERO star. Why? 1. Bad smell in room 2. TV didn't work 3. Towels were dirty 4. Bed was dirty (We had to go to walmart and buy a blanket because it was too gross to sleep on) 5. Floors were filty (I had to wear shoes because it was so sticky) 6. Pool was green 7. Walls were dirty 8. The smell of the room made my clothes smell bad 9. Hardly any water came out of the faucets 10. Did not feel safe 11. Worst hotel I have ever heard about or stayed in 12. No hairdryer, phone, alarm clock, iron 13. The description says it has a fridge and a microwave....IT DOES NOT. 14. All of the furniture was ruined and/or chipped Unless you don't mind all of this, stay here. We transferred to Springhill by Marriott and it was $30 more a night...WELL worth the extra money. The Marriott made us feel like royalty compared to Gold Star. Do NOT stay at Gold Star...it's beyond nasty.

Reviews.Title: “Simple, Clean & Low Priced.”
Reviews.Author: crave4m
Reviews.Content: I guess I've just been lucky when it comes to hotel rooms most of the time because everything about this hotel is good. Compared to Hyatt or Marriott it might be decent but it's a good place to stay at night nonetheless. I got a double bed room, the room was very clean, beds were made, bathroom was clean. I love how spacious the room is compared to a lot of other better names hotel. The towels are clean, the bathroom counter is long, great for women since we have so much stuffs. There's a table and a chair in the room which is perfect if you have business to do. The A/C unit is fine, no loud noises. There's a microwave and fridge included which is one of the reasons I chose this hotel. Other hotels would have charge a $10 fee a day to have just either the fridge or microwave and $20 for both. It's a bargain. I got the room for $25 a night, couldn't ask for more. Everything is clean and I will definitely come back to stay.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jennyb0523
Reviews.Content: Do not book a vacation home with Gold Star Vacation Homes! They lock the temp control to 78 degrees after a long hot day at the parks this is not a fun thing to have to come home to. The homes are dirty and could use some painting!! If you have loved ones with you with heart problems most of you know that you cannot store some of the medications at that temp!! Very Dissapointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, Relaxing, Clean and Great Price!”
Reviews.Author: Mimi547
Reviews.Content: This motel is not a 4 star but for the price it was great and better than I expected. The room was clean, A/C worked great, very quiet and housekeeping kept us supplied with clean towels and empty trash every day. Close to Walmart, restaurants and only 10 minutes from SeaWorld. My daughter used the pool every night. I will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great for $20 a night”
Reviews.Author: johnnywilko
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for four nights at the beginning of May and paid $20 plus tax a night. For that price the Goldstar Inn is good value, it's location for the parks especially the Disney ones is great and is also near loads of restaurants to eat from at night. The rooms were clean and don't think for $20 we had any complaints at all

Reviews.Title: “Best value if you bargain for rates”
Reviews.Author: chino53
Reviews.Content: We had 2 rooms $25 each, very clean& functional. Pool not heated. Has 2 one bedroom suites for families. Good place to stay for just one night on a budget. But no extras, no breakfast, no iron, older tv, no coffee pot.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't beleive the deal I got!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: chattyblue85
Reviews.Content: First and foremost I have to say the location is great!!! It is smack dab in the middle of anything and everything you need. All the parks are very close. From the beginning of my stay I was impressed with the staff. The rooms are very homey and CLEAN!!!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: rochelle8809
Reviews.Content: We had selected this hotel because we just needed a spot to sleep at for just 2 nights because we going to Universal. When we arrived to the hotel they placed us in a double room and we paid for a king room. They said that all the rooms were booked and that they will move us in the morning. The next morning they gave us the key to the new room and the first thing I noticed when I opened the door the bed was unmade. After seeing that we decided that we were no longer going to stay.We got a refund. This experience caused us to go back home because there were no available hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Can't complain too much when you pay $17/nt!”
Reviews.Author: g3m1n1
Reviews.Content: This motel is obviously not the Ritz Carlton, but for the price it worked. Located on 192 in Kissimmee, just east of the really heavy traffic but still close enough to everything. Rooms are quite outdated, but the bed was comfortable, the room was quiet, the staff was friendly, & the wi-fi worked great. All rooms are non-smoking and there are no chairs or ashtrays outside the room. We came from the Tampa, Florida area just for the night and had a wonderful time. Made for a cheap night away, I'm sure we will be doing it again!

Reviews.Title: “Was pleasantly surprised for the price”
Reviews.Author: prdgranma
Reviews.Content: Had made my accomodations here based on other reviews and for the price I was willing to check them out though I really didn't expect to find a great hotel. When we got there the building look so-so but decided to give it a go. Front desk was extremely nice. Room was surprisingly clean and nice. Bed I thought was comfortable. We stayed there for 5 nights and the only problem we had was maid did not show up to clean. On our third day, on our way out to go eat dinner I had to go to the front desk and ask for clean towels and toilet paper. Receptionist at the desk was surprised the maid hadn't been to our room. By the time we got back to our room the towels and toilet paper were in our rooms. Also the next to the last day we were there my daughter had to be rushed to the hospital, she pulled a sciatic nerve in her back in the shower and could bearly walk. I went to the front desk to ask where the nearest hospital was and the manager was so helpful he went on his computer and printed out directions for me to the nearest hospital. I was extremely greatful for this as I was a nervous reck as it was. Next time I saw the manager he asked me how my daughter was. I thought that was very nice of him. All in all for the price of the rooms my family and I had a very enjoyable stay. And my granddaughter LOVED the pool. I would definetly stay there again if I was in that area.

Reviews.Title: “If you like roaches then this is the place for ya!!!”
Reviews.Author: KeithJonez
Reviews.Content: I took my mom here because I was getting married at the wedding chapel the next day. They were real pleasant at checkin only charged 25 bucks for the night which was great, we went out to eat and when we came back to the room they key didnt work once we went to the desk to get it straightend out there were no issues untill we turned on the lights and saw about 12 roaches scattering away, upon further investigation we noticed there we bugs everywhere in all the drawers, the bathroom light didnt work, there was even a dead roach in the picture hanging on the wall. Absolutly disguisting we called the front desk and the promptly refunded the money which was good with out any hesitation or attitude.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Feelings”
Reviews.Author: grellaudpigati
Reviews.Content: As title says, I have some mixed feelings for this hotel. For one thing I have to say that even though it is located right in 192 (Irlo Bronson), you have to be sure to ask for a room located in the left side of the property (facing lobby) because on the right there is literally nothing (just forest). This made it really creepy and give a feeling of unsafety. First room we got was on right side and key chain was broken (creepy). On the other hand staff is the best (specially Daphne and manager). We asked for another room (to the right side) and they had no problem. They even treated me vey nice the next morning when my wife asked me to go to another hotel (wife rules my home). They even gave me a refund for the 2 additional nights I prepaid. Overall, I think that with a good repair and those prices and specially, that staff, this would easily become a #1 choice for budget accomodations in Orlando/Kissimme

Reviews.Title: “Good for a family on a budget!”
Reviews.Author: trecob
Reviews.Content: My family of 5, 2 adults and 3 children, stayed in this hotel for 7 nights on our vacation. The first two nights we stayed in two double rooms (because the suite that we were supposed to have was flooded) and then we were given a suite for the last 5 nights. Both the double rooms were ok. The suite was nice for families. Pool is NOT heated. Ice machine is on the second floor. There are no laudrry facilities on the grounds but they did say that their was one down the road (though I didn't find it). All in all not a bad place, far better than I expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: glo419
Reviews.Content: I booked a room for three nights. When I returned the second night after the Daytona 500 my key did not work. So, I went down to the lobby and the new manager Susan stated that she had booked the room to some one else despite the fact I had booked it for three nights.and there was no vacancy. She called other motels to see if there was any vacancy. There was none, so they did put me in a room with no air condidioning. Not because of the manager but because of a gentleman in there with her. She also stated I would have to stay in that room. The next day however a new employee had put me in another room. She had more knowledge than her manager. I called the corportate office and NO RESPONSE!! They just didn't care.

Reviews.Title: “It was okay”
Reviews.Author: cruz8
Reviews.Content: I reserved a suite because there were six of staying in the room and this would accomodate all of us, well when we arrived to check in our room was out of commission and evidently this hotel only has two suites, we were down graded to an ajoining room with two queen size beds which was fine but not a suite, the suite had a broken air conditioner and the person who took the reservation never switched it to the other suite. In the midst of the clerk trying to find us a room we were getting fustrated, it took more than a half hour to find us a room and when we finally got our room is was clean and close to the office the only other issue I had with the room was the first night I found a cockaroach in the bathroom after that I didn't see anymore, the maids did a decent job in cleaning the room although they did not change the bed the whole time we were there which grossed me out but that was it. I would not stay again.

Reviews.Title: “I was very, very pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: jjar8
Reviews.Content: When I made the booking and noted the price of the rooms, I was expecting to get an old, probably not so clean room. My family was pleasantly surpised. The rooms were newly renovated, very clean, carpet was clean. The bathroom was also very clean. Do not be nervous about the price. You do get value for your money.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: RobertsClan
Reviews.Content: Our holiday this year was a trip around Florida so we booked the Goldstar for the first two nights before we set off. When we eventually arrived there (the only thing I can criticise is the lack of directions we received from them), the accommodation was absolutely spotless. The beds, bathroom, carpets, everything about the place was clean and tidy. The reception area and breakfast area again was spotless. The staff were exceptionally helpful and pleasant. I would definitely stay here again. Would recommend this accommodation to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible, Avoid it”
Reviews.Author: multi32
Reviews.Content: I booked a suite, and It's nothing similar to the description. The "kitchen" is just a old toaster and a very old microwave oven. The two beds are at same bedroom (the only one), because the other bedroom is the "kitchen" and the "living room" without bed, just a Pullout Couch, not very comfortable. Avoid it

Reviews.Title: “A great budget hotel - Clean, colorful and Fun”
Reviews.Author: MAD&Dib
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel in June 2005. I was very pleased with my clean room. The carpet in my room was new and so was the paint on the walls. The pool was very nice and management was very accomodating and easy to deal with. I felt safe at the hotel and it isn't very far from all of the attractions.

Reviews.Title: “poor on service”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel offers only limited service. However, there are hidden charges for service .the management always threatens the guests with eviction based on Florida law.

HotelInfo.Name: Westmont Inn&Suites Kissimmee
HotelInfo.Address: 4600 W Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34746 (Formerly Goldstar Inn & Suites)
